1.「……材料さえ 取ってきてくれれば| 薬を作れて この人が治るかもしれないのよ！: ... If you could just get me the|ingredients, I could make a potion that|might cure this man!

So I did some research on the disease, and|it turns out that it's a deadly disease that|can cause people to freeze to death if left|
|untreated.

15.「私 ここで 調合の準備をして 待ってるね。: I'm here preparing the concoction, waiting.

17.「私…… この人を治すまで| 絶対 ここを出ていかないわ。| そう決めたの！: I... I... I'm not leaving here until I fix|him. I've made up my mind!

|shit!

37.「そろそろ <pc>さんが| 帰ってくるはずだから| 薬を調合する手順を 確認し: <pc> should be home soon, so|I'm just going over the steps for mixing the|pills!

46.「震えは おさまったみたい！: The tremors seem to have subsided!
